mode_adc

ADC sampling and streaming/logging mode.

This function contains the 'A' mode of the sensor which allows to acquire multiple ADC channels and stream or log them.

TODO

  • Statistics when logging could display log-only information (samples acquired, samples lost, samples per second)

Functions
CommandParserADCPullup
unsigned char CommandParserADCPullup(
char *buffer,
unsigned char size
)

Parses a user command to enable/disable the pull-ups on the ADC inputs.

Command format: P,<on>

Activates or desactivates the pull-up.

Parameters
buffer
char*

Buffer containing the command

size
unsigned char

Length of the buffer containing the command

CommandParserADC
unsigned char CommandParserADC(
char *buffer,
unsigned char size
)

Parses a user command to enter the ADC mode.

Command format: A,<mask>,<period>

Stores the mask and period in eeprom.

Parameters
buffer
char*

Buffer containing the command

size
unsigned char

Length of the buffer containing the command

mode_adc
void mode_adc(
void
)

ADC mode loop.

This function initialises the board for ADC acquisition and enters a continuous sample/stream loop.
